name: Genesis Entrepreneurship & Business Networking
tag_list: entrepreneurship, entrepreneurs, business-consultancy, advisory, mentorship, young-entrepreneurs, women-entrepreneurs, social-entrepreneurs, renwable-energy-entrepreneurs, creativity, innovation, business-plan, project-management, management-consultancy
overview:
Global Entrepreneurship & Business Network(www.gebnonline.com) is an initiative from GEBN PVT LTD company registered in Delhi. The aim of company is to foster all forms of entrepreneurship and provides business solution to emerging entrepreneurs, running and startup organization online and offline. We provide services right from idea generation, business planning, project management, advisory, mentorship, legal, financial, company formation, business plan implementation to distribution, marketing, advertising, website designing support all under one roof.

The company is in initially phase of business plan execution and there are loads of activities lined up for future. GEBN is in process of building first time in India a â€œOne Stop Solution Shopâ€ for entrepreneurs and for that we are looking for business partners, Venture capitalists, Angel Investors to collaborate.

We are providing business opportunities to management students & professionals to test their entrepreneurial skills and earn while learning.

If you are interested to know more in detail you may visit our website or if you have any query regarding business proposal, funding or collaboration feel free to contact us. GEBN is all about Entrepreneurship & Entrepreneurs.

â€œChanging Entrepreneurship Dreams Into Realityâ€

Thanks & regards
